title: Taiwan: An Underrated Paradise
description: Blending travelogue and guidebook, An Underrated Paradise chronicles a young Black woman's whimsical encounters with culture shock and the places and people she meets while living in Taiwan. Her venture reminds us what it means to explore- beyond the picture perfect moments and into the history of a place and the journey to self discovery. The tail-end travel manual and itineraries encourage you to choose adventure, even if that means traveling alone.
author: Brittany Edwards
